title: Vietnamese Chicken and Noodle Soup - Pho
ingredients: ['115g dry Chinese egg noodles', '1.5 litres chicken stock', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh root ginger', '1 tablespoon finely chopped lemon grass', '5 spring onions, chopped', '180g cubed cooked chicken', '70g beansprouts', '70g pak choi, chopped']
